title: Increase gameplay screen size for larger playfield display

requirements.summary: Increase the Snake game playfield canvas size to occupy more screen space and provide a more prominent, comfortable gameplay area
acceptanceCriteria: The playfield canvas renders significantly larger than the current small size
The gameplay area is prominent and comfortable to view on desktop screens
The canvas remains responsive and appropriately sized on mobile devices
The larger canvas does not cause layout issues with the HUD or control legend

file_operations.description: Increase the CSS custom properties and utility classes that define the playfield sizing to make the canvas significantly larger. Update max-width and height constraints for .playfield-container or equivalent sizing utilities to occupy more viewport space while maintaining the square aspect ratio and responsive behavior across screen sizes.

Adjust the layout container or wrapper sizing for the game canvas to accommodate the larger playfield dimensions. Ensure the HUD and control legend remain properly positioned and do not overlap or conflict with the expanded canvas area.

Review and adjust canvas sizing logic if needed to ensure the ResizeObserver and rendering behavior properly handle the larger dimensions. Verify that high-DPI rendering scales correctly with the increased canvas size and that the grid, food, and snake body render properly at the new scale.
